    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Helenismo y arquitectura</string>
            <string language="en">Hellenism and architecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hellenism und Architektur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hellénisme et architecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hellenism e arquitetura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hellenism ed architettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνισμός και αρχιτεκτονική</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Contenidos que refuerzan los conocimientos de la arquitectura clásica, posibilitando el reconocimiento de los tres órdenes arquitectónicos.</string>
            <string language="en">Contents which reinforce knowledge about classical architecture, making it possible to recognise the three architectural orders.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">arquitectura</string>
            <string language="en">architecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Helenismo</string>
            <string language="en">Hellenism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inhalt, die Wissen über klassische Architektur 
verstärkt, es möglich machend, die drei architektonischen Ordnungen 
zu erkennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contenu qui renforce la connaissance au sujet de 
l'architecture classique, permettant pour identifier les trois 
commandes architecturales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Índices que reforça o conhecimento sobre a 
arquitetura clássica, fazendo a possível reconhecer as três ordens 
architectural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soddisfare che rinforza la conoscenza circa 
architettura classica, permettente di riconoscere i tre ordini 
architettonici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιεχόμενο που ενισχύει τη γνώση για την κλασσική 
αρχιτεκτονική, που καθιστά το πιθανό να αναγνωρίσει τις τρεις 
αρχιτεκτονικές κατατάξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Architektur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hellenism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">architecture</string>
